channel.title: Comments on: Impersonating a SQL Server DBA
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Phil factor
item.dc:creator: Phil factor
item.description: You'll love http://www.simple-talk.com/content/article.aspx?article=570 (Brad's Sure DBA Checklist) which has a pretty comprehensive checklist for the 'accidental DBA' or DBA-impersonator.
item.content:encoded: You’ll love http://www.simple-talk.com/content/article.aspx?article=570 (Brad’s Sure DBA Checklist) which has a pretty comprehensive checklist for the ‘accidental DBA’ or DBA-impersonator.

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Good points... I've been considering this for a little while now and will be looking into the things you have pointed out. Thanks.
item.content:encoded: Good points… I’ve been considering this for a little while now and will be looking into the things you have pointed out. Thanks.
